Articles.Content: Just a quick 'Hello World!' From Copenhagen. Been kerballing around since .18-ish, and been enjoying it ever since
We are glad to see someone new on here! Feel free to post comments or concerns in their correct forum location! As always have fun and enjoy your stay!

Welcome to the forums!

Copenhagen... You wouldn't happen to know these guys, would you?

If you need help on anything, be sure to check out the Drawing Board (link in my sig), which has a number of tutorials and other useful reference materials. The people in the How To forums will also likely be able to answer any questions you may have about playing the game. Feel free to jump into any conversation that interests you.

Happy landings!

Heh heh.. Yes, the 'local' rocketheroes! I'm afraid I know them only from media. Awesome endeavour these guys are on. My respect for that is endless.

Anyways, thanks, I will ask as needed. I already learned lots from here and (of course) from watching the vids of a certain mr. Manley..
